action.content:
You are playing a text adventure game. I will describe what you can perceive in the game. You write the single action you want to take in the game starting with >. Only reply with an action.
For example:
> open cupboard

You can have up to two objects in your inventory at the same time.

Your goal for this game is: Put the potted plant on the table, the book in the refrigerator and the mop in the wardrobe.

Once you have achieved your goal, write "> done" to end the game.

You are in a kitchen now. There are a cupboard and a counter. The cupboard is closed. There are passages to a pantry and a hallway here.
The cupboard is now open. In the cupboard there is a plate.
You take the plate. In your inventory you have a plate.
You are in a pantry now. There are a freezer and a refrigerator. The freezer is closed. The refrigerator is closed. There is a passage to a kitchen here.
The refrigerator is now open. In the refrigerator there are a banana, a sandwich, a apple, a peach and a orange.

> take book 

(I revised it to) 
> go to kitchen
You can't see a book here.
You are in a kitchen now. There are a cupboard and a counter. The cupboard is open. There are passages to a pantry and a hallway here.
You are in a hallway now. There is a potted plant. The potted plant is on the floor. There are passages to a living room, a broom closet and a kitchen here.
You take the potted plant. In your inventory you have a potted plant and a plate.
You are in a living room now. There are a side table, a shelf, a chair and a couch. There are passages to a hallway and a bedroom here.

> put potted plant on side table, then go to hallway 

(I revised it to) 
> put potted plant on side table 

was not valid so I changed to) 
> go to hallway

content.arg:
No terminal matches ',' in the current parser context, at line 1 col 31

put potted plant on side table, then go to hallway
                              ^
Expected one of: 
	* WORD
	* WS

action.content: I don't know what you mean.
> put potted plant on side table
You put the potted plant on the side table.
You are in a hallway now. There are passages to a living room, a broom closet and a kitchen here.
You are in a broom closet now. There are a broom and a mop. The broom is on the floor. The mop is on the floor. There is a passage to a hallway here.
You take the mop. In your inventory you have a plate and a mop.
You can't go to a bedroom from here.
You are in a hallway now. There are passages to a living room, a broom closet and a kitchen here.
You are in a living room now. There are a side table, a shelf, a chair, a couch and a potted plant. The potted plant is on the side table. There are passages to a hallway and a bedroom here.
You are in a bedroom now. There are a table, a bed and a wardrobe. The wardrobe is closed. There is a passage to a living room here.
The wardrobe is now open. In the wardrobe there are a pillow and a book.
Your inventory can not hold more than two objects at the same time.
I don't know how to interpret this 'drop' action.
You can't go to a kitchen from here.
You are in a living room now. There are a side table, a shelf, a chair, a couch and a potted plant. The potted plant is on the side table. There are passages to a hallway and a bedroom here.
You are in a hallway now. There are passages to a living room, a broom closet and a kitchen here.
You are in a kitchen now. There are a cupboard and a counter. The cupboard is open. There are passages to a pantry and a hallway here.

You are in a pantry now. There are a freezer, a sandwich, a apple, a banana, a peach, a refrigerator and a orange. The freezer is closed. The sandwich is in the refrigerator. The apple is in the refrigerator. The banana is in the refrigerator. The peach is in the refrigerator. The refrigerator is open. The orange is in the refrigerator. There is a passage to a kitchen here.
You can't see a book here.
You can't go to a bedroom from here.
You are in a kitchen now. There are a cupboard and a counter. The cupboard is open. There are passages to a pantry and a hallway here.
You are in a hallway now. There are passages to a living room, a broom closet and a kitchen here.
You are in a broom closet now. There is a broom. The broom is on the floor. There is a passage to a hallway here.
You are in a hallway now. There are passages to a living room, a broom closet and a kitchen here.
You are in a living room now. There are a side table, a shelf, a chair, a couch and a potted plant. The potted plant is on the side table. There are passages to a hallway and a bedroom here.

You are in a bedroom now. There are a pillow, a table, a book, a bed and a wardrobe. The pillow is in the wardrobe. The book is in the wardrobe. The wardrobe is open. There is a passage to a living room here.
You put the mop in the wardrobe.
Model produced DONE action at turn 36, end episode.
